name: Punctual Pistol
description:
It is a 2D platform shooter game with the aim to kill all the masked men with a timed pistol. The pistol is not in the control of the player and it fires everytime the timer runs out. Do not shoot the good guys (unmasked men) with your pistol. You only have a limited number of bullets to complete each level. 

Controls:

  • A and D for player movement
  • SPACE to jump
  • ESC to pause the game

This is my first major game project. As a result it might have some bugs. I have did my best to fix all the issues and bugs which I encountered while testing the game.
